title: The Actor’s Trunk
description: Actor Aubrey Fields hosts an improvisational variety show where actors and actresses perform based on mystery objects in an old trunk.
quote: I'm going to add to the trunk… a frying pan.
altHero: Aubrey Fields on a small stage next to a trunk
alt1: actor David Harbour Jr. on stage
alt2: actor David Harbour Jr. peering through a tennis racquet
alt3: Aubrey Fields holding a frying pan
alt4: actress Monica Fulton performing on stage
